ProjectOasis.details: The OASIS Metaverse welcomes all nature-loving blockchain gamers to create, own, play, earn and interact with like-minded natives in its virtual world of lush greeneries and natural beauty.

Cryptomeda.details: Cryptomeda is a gaming ecosystem that uniquely blends NFT collectibles, DEFI mechanics, and iconic crypto characters into an exciting fantasy world. Players of all experience levels can explore Cryptomeda and find various opportunities to earn.
